an6.65:1.1: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo anāgāmiphalaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an6.65:1.3: Assaddhiyaṃ, ahirikaṃ, anottappaṃ, kosajjaṃ, muṭṭhassaccaṃ, duppaññataṃ—
an6.65:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahāya abhabbo anāgāmiphalaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an6.65:2.1: Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo anāgāmiphalaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an6.65:2.3: Assaddhiyaṃ, ahirikaṃ, anottappaṃ, kosajjaṃ, muṭṭhassaccaṃ, duppaññataṃ—
an6.65:2.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahāya bhabbo anāgāmiphalaṃ sacchikātun”ti.
